sakai:query-template: SELECT * FROM [nt:base] WHERE PATH([nt:base]) LIKE '/{_requeststore}/%' WHERE sling:resourceType = 'sakai/joinrequest' and sakai:state = 'denied'
sakai:title: Join Requests - Approved
sakai:shortDescription: Get all the denied requests to join a join.
sakai:description: Search to get all the denied requests to join a site.
sakai:response:
Standard request.
Example: Request to: /sites/mysite/approved.json
{
   "query": "//_user/contacts/_x0037_9/_x0039_4/ea/_x0034_6/simong//*[@sling:resourceType="sakai/contact" and @sakai:state!="PENDING"]",
   "items": 25,
   "total": 0,
   "results": []}
